ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: I never got close enough to them to get burned ;-) I can definitely sympathize though! Kit ... From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@pinkpig.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
I never got close enough to them to get burned ;-)

I can definitely sympathize though!

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 10:59 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?


At 10:35 AM 1/10/2001 -0700, you wrote:
>heh heh, twice. Both times I let friends convince me to come back. I must
>say though if there were any other mmorpg's out there currently with bards
I
>would likely quit and at least try the other game. Not saying I wouldn't
>come back, but it wouldn't be hard at this point to lure me away given the
>immense frustration VI has built up in me over the last year.


I would come back, but Verant runs it.

Talies the burned
